channel.title: Whonix KVM 14.0.0.9.6 XFCE Released
channel.description:
I'm happy to announce the first release of KVM with the lightweight XFCE desktop environment installed. Credit to @Algernon.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Download_Whonix
***
It's also the first release signed with a different key than Patrick's. To verify the images you will need to grab my release signing key as per the instructions:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Verify_the_Whonix_images

item.title: Whonix KVM 14.0.0.9.6 XFCE Released
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
I’m happy to announce the first release of KVM with the lightweight XFCE desktop environment installed. Credit to @Algernon.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Download_Whonix

It’s also the first release signed with a different key than Patrick’s. To verify the images you will need to grab my release signing key as per the instructions:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Verify_the_Whonix_images

Read full topic
